com.docker.domain.gameobject

Class Foreground

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.docker.domain.gameobject.Foreground

  • public class Foreground
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    Author:
    HAL9000 The Foreground is the foremost graphical plane displayed during the game.
